Login.title: Login Page
Login.body_1: Input your username and password or use your social account to login.
Login.body_2: If you are a business owner and do not have an account.
Login.desc_username: Your registered username, email, or phone number

Stepper.subtitle_step_2: Choose plan based on your needs

Step_1.title: Fill your details
Step_1.body_1: Please fill the form below. We want to make the registration as simple as possible.
Step_1.personal_email_desc: We will send you a verification email later to this email.
Step_1.val_format_email: Email is not in a correct format.
Step_1.val_format_phone: Phone number is not in a correct format.
Step_1.body_2: All informations can be updated later.

Step_2.title: Choose your plan
Step_2.body_1: Choose plan that suits your business needs. You may change the plan at a later date.
Step_2.plan_free_desc: For those who want to try to grow their business from zero.
Step_2.plan_silver_desc: A good upgrade for your business life.
Step_2.plan_gold_desc: Great choice for starter to an expert.
Step_2.user_tier: {value, select, 1 {Community support} 2 {Developer support} 3 {Highest priority developer support} other {Not supported}}.
Step_2.branch_limit: Up to {value, plural, =0 {# branch} =1 {# branch} other {# branches}}.
Step_2.product_limit: Up to {value, plural, =0 {# product} =1 {# product} other {# products}}.
Step_2.daily_transaction: Up to {value, plural, =0 {# daily transaction} =1 {# daily transaction} other {# daily transactions}}.

Step_3.title: Review before registration
Step_3.body_1: Take a look once again before creating your account and start using application.
Step_3.name: Name
Step_3.tnc_checkbox: By creating my account, I agree with terms and conditions.
